It shows that almost 80% of children and youth use the internet. The results provide the basis for the formulation of
2070/A0/04/003/002.indicator_name: Number of digital safety awareness programme launched

2070/A0/04/003/002.status_value: On-track: Three national media channels (Kompas  Teenvoice  RRI) have been identified and UNICEF has engaged with them to ensure they provide regular opportunities for young people. 2070/A0/04/004/001.status_value: Government Regulation Number 33/2012 on Exclusive Breastfeeding has been passed. Together with existing legislation that prohibits the marketing of Breastmilk Substitutes for children aged less than one year  the legislation in Indonesia now covers "many" of the provisions of the International Code of Marketing of Breastmilk Substitutes. Ministerial Decree Number 15/2014 on the administrative procedures for imposing sanctions on health facilities violating Government Regulation Number 33/2012 re
